txt.en: Collected piles of logs outside Snowbourn ([placeholder]/[placeholder])
In Fastred's absence, Snowbourn must be provisioned and supplied for the coming war.

'If you wish to aid us while you wait for Fastred's return, I have a task for you.

'The Riders have been facing more opposition in the fields as of late, and we constantly need more materials for repairs to the farmsteads, as well as new arms and armour for the Riders themselves.

'If you would, gather wood, spears, and leather scraps for me, and I will send them along to the appropriate craftsfolk.'
Piles of logs can be found near felled trees outside the walls, while spears and leather can be gathered within the city.\n\nLéofhelm has asked you to gather the materials needed to supply Snowbourn.
'You have my thanks.\n\n'Through your efforts, we did not have to spread ourselves as thin upon the fields.'
Léofhelm can be found in the Mead Hall of Snowbourn.\n\nYou should return to Léofhelm and let him know that you have done as he asked.
